Class DefaultMIMETypes

java.lang.Object

public class DefaultMIMETypes
extends Object

Holds the default MIME types.

Method Detail

addMIMEType

protected static void addMIMEType(short number,
                                  String type)
Add a MIME type, without any extensions.

Parameters:
number - The number of the MIME type for compression. This *must not change* for a given type, or the metadata format will be affected.
type - The actual MIME type string. Do not include ;charset= etc; these are parameters and there is a separate mechanism for them.

addMIMEType

protected static void addMIMEType(short number,
                                  String type,
                                  String[] extensions,
                                  String outExtension)
Add a MIME type.

Parameters:
number - The number of the MIME type for compression. This *must not change* for a given type, or the metadata format will be affected.
type - The actual MIME type string. Do not include ;charset= etc; these are parameters and there is a separate mechanism for them.
extensions - An array of common extensions for files of this type. Must be unique for the type.

addMIMEType

protected static void addMIMEType(short number,
                                  String type,
                                  String extensions)
Add a MIME type, with extensions separated by spaces. This is more or less the format in /etc/mime-types.

addMIMEType

protected static void addMIMEType(short number,
                                  String type,
                                  String extensions,
                                  String outExtension)
Add a MIME type, with extensions separated by spaces. This is more or less the format in /etc/mime-types.

byNumber

public static String byNumber(short x)
Get a known MIME type by number.

byName

public static short byName(String s)
Get the number of a MIME type, or -1 if it is not in the table of known MIME types, in which case it will have to be sent uncompressed.

guessMIMEType

public static String guessMIMEType(String arg,
                                   boolean noDefault)
Guess a MIME type from a filename.

Parameters:
noDefault - If true, no default MIME type; return null if not recognized. Otherwise if we don't recognize the extension we return DEFAULT_MIME_TYPE.

getExtension

public static String getExtension(String type)

isValidExt

                                 String oldExt)
